com.io7m.jpra.runtime.java

Interface JPRAStringCursorReadableType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JPRAStringCursorType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JPRAStringCursorByteBuffered

    public interface JPRAStringCursorReadableType
    The type of read-only pointers to strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte getByte(int index) 
      void getBytes(byte[] buf, int offset, int length) 
      Charset getEncoding() 
      int getMaximumLength()

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumLength

        int getMaximumLength()
        Returns:
        The maximum length of the string in octets

      • getUsedLength

        int getUsedLength()
        Returns:
        The number of octets of the string that are actually being used

      • getByte

        byte getByte(int index)
      throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        index - The byte index
        Returns:
        The byte at index index in the string
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Iff index >= getMaximumLength()

      • getBytes

        void getBytes(byte[] buf,
              int offset,
              int length)
       throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to which string data will be written
        offset - The starting index of buf to which data will be written
        length - The number of octets to copy into buf
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Iff length > getMaximumLength()

      • getNewValue

        String getNewValue()
        Returns:
        A freshly allocated string based on the current contents of the string data

      • getEncoding

        Charset getEncoding()
        Returns:
        The string encoding
